column1: The objective of the game is to capture your opponent's flag.
You get an army of 19 standard pieces, soldier  pieces each ranked 1 - 9 in power.
Additionally, you also get 2 Grenades, 3 landmines,  and a Flag piece.
You should place all pieces on the board before starting the game,  leaving all camp sites empty.
Pieces can be moved one square in any direction, with the exception of the Engineer.
The Engineer piece can move an unlimited number of squares in any direction only on railways.
The Landmine and Flag pieces cannot move.
Two mountains in the middle of the board serves as obstacles from movement.
Example: Marshal (rank 1) vs. Brigadier (rank 4) [BRIGADIER IS CAPTURED].
If the two pieces are equally ranked, both are captured.
The Landmine pieces defeat all pieces except for the Engineers (rank 9) who can defuse them.
The Grenade defeats all pieces, however both pieces are gone.
Any moveable piece can capture the flag.
